comment.author: 9071215@N04
comment._content: I believe this ship is misidentified and is actually Vizcaya. Post-battle photos of Vizcaya on other sites show the fallen mast next to the aft turret, where non of the post-battlephotos of Ocendo show this feature.

comment.author: 26093461@N00
comment._content: Thanks for adding to NPOI. Something very exotic about these wreck photos.

comment.author: 41675580@N08
comment._content: A very interesting series of pictures, appreciate seeing them here.
